definition: A sense of assurance and belief in one's own abilities, typically used to describe a person's confidence and self-assuredness in various aspects of life, such as personal relationships, professional endeavors, or facing challenges.

examples.english: She has a lot of self-confidence.

examples.german: Ohne Selbstvertrauen wird es schwer, Erfolg zu haben.
examples.english: Without self-confidence, it will be difficult to succeed.

examples.german: Selbstvertrauen ist wichtig, um Herausforderungen anzunehmen.
examples.english: Self-confidence is important to take on challenges.
